comments.body:
```suggestion
    getStyles: (name: string, props?: any) => {};
```

I feel like I've used `getStyles` without the 2nd arg before. Also, can `{}` be improved?

Might also be worth a shared type:

`type GetStylesFn = (name: string, props?: any) => CSSObject`

This is just copy-pasted from the [place I moved it from](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/50924/files#diff-14ada9224e93f24b2fe4e7de0789b5df415ad44d45a716f121a1a7d3e8f70445L40). It can certainly be improved, but I think that can be a separate PR. I believe the `props` must always be provided.
